changeSet.author: hondasmx
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE if not exists futures_margin ( id integer generated by default as identity NOT NULL, figi text unique NOT NULL, margin_on_buy real not null, margin_on_sell real not null, min_price_increment real not null, min_price_increment_amount real not null, created_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now() NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) );
ALTER TABLE futures_margin OWNER TO postgres;
